alert.note: Alert for Lamar; Marion (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 9:10PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Marion and southern Lamar Counties through 1000 PM CDT... At 910 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Kokomo to near Baxterville. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Baxterville around 915 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
